subject: Re: [junit] [Fwd: Re: Check class file for annotation]
msgSnippet: ... It seems to be overkill.  setAccessible() is usually enough to test private methods.  I m really not sure the poster understands what apt does and I don t
messageBody:
On 1/29/06, Andrew McDonagh <yahoogroups@...> wrote:
>
>
> Just came across this post on comp.lang.java.programmer...
>
> Does anyone here ever go to this length of trouble to test private stuff?


It seems to be overkill. setAccessible() is usually enough to test private
methods. I'm really not sure the poster understands what apt does and I
don't see the point in a special annotation for this either...

--
Cédric


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
